description: Designed to help teachers identify and work effectively with students who have learning disabilities. Provides examples of the frustration and failure of children whose problems are not recognised, as well as the remarkable success of children whose behavioural patterns are diagnosed as a learning disability and are dealt with appropriately. Suitable for teachers and tertiary level.
